name: It's the little things that keep us together
name_original: It's the little things that keep us together
description:
It's the little things that keep us together

You play as Al and Cc and long-time married couple. In order to stay JOINED TOGETHER in love and keep the marriage happy you will need to choose selfless acts in everyday life.

Click on the Items in colour and make a choice.

Love diminishes over TIME so keep making the right choices and you will stay JOINED TOGETHER in love.
